short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PriceLasso lets you track prices on Amazon, Walmart, Costco and more with intelligent price drop alerts and price history charts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PriceLasso will automatically create intelligent price alerts from products you frequently order from Amazon and on your wishlist. You'll get notified whenever an item drops to your desired price and see the price history to know it's a good deal. 

With the PriceLasso price tracker, you can:
✅ Automatically create price alerts
✅ Track any product on Amazon, Walmart, and more
✅ Easily import Amazon wishlists, items in your shopping cart, and saved for later products
✅ Get price tracking email alerts 24/7 when the price drops
✅ See price history charts on sites like Wayfair, Macys, and Office Depot


Looking to make a big purchase like a new TV, camping tent, or new pair of Nike running shoes? You can easily track the prices from leading online stores like Amazon, Walmart, and Costco and buy when the price drops.

Online stores like Amazon have hundreds of millions of price changes per day. How do you make sure you're getting the best price?
With the PriceLasso price tracker, you'll always get the best price with intelligent price alerts. Easily import your Amazon wishlist, shopping cart, and saved for later items for price tracking. 

With our price tracking chrome extension, you can automatically create price alerts, track any product on the most popular online stores, and get alerts 24/7 when the price drops.
